trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> types to UI Automation.
The element associated with this automation peer.
The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group" /> enumeration value.
Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.

Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.

An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="patternInterface" />가 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" /> 또는 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 값이면 컨트롤을 지원하는 개체이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Hides all controls that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Shows the controls that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />에 연결된 컨트롤의 확장 또는 축소 상태를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />를 컨테이너의 볼 수 있는 영역으로 스크롤합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.
